/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a hazy blue, suggesting either an early morning or late afternoon setting. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
